price: 7. Ezalaki ya sólo, epai ya Yûsuf na bandeko baye bilembo тропа batuni mituna.
arabic: ۞ لَّقَدۡ كَانَ فِي يُوسُفَ وَإِخۡوَتِهِۦٓ ءَايَٰتٞ لِّلسَّآئِلِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: laqad kāna fī yūsufa wa-ikh'watihi āyātun lilssāilīna
